ingredients.item: 4 frozen Waitrose Greek Sea Bass Fillets, thawed
25g pack flat leaf parsley, leaves picked

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 220Â°C, gas mark 7. Cook the potatoes in a large pan of boiling water for 12 minutes, add the chickpeas and cook for a further 2-3 minutes, until the potatoes are tender.

Meanwhile, divide the courgettes among 4 large squares of foil. Place a sea bass fillet on top of each and scatter over the salad onions. Bring up the edges of the foil and tightly seal. Sit the parcels on a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes, until the fish is cooked through.

Drain the potatoes and chick peas and return to the pan. Add the parsley and a splash of olive oil and toss well together. Serve with the fish, courgettes and any cooking juices, and a lemon wedge, for squeezing over.
